From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enable the link-status event messaging on an interface, use the **logging event link-status** command in interface configuration mode. To disable the link-status event messaging, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

ExtraInfo: To enable system logging of interface state-change events on a specific interface, enter the **logging event link-status** command.To enable system logging of interface state-change events on all interfaces in the system, enter the **logging event link-status** command.

RelatedCmds.description: Displays the status and configuration of the module or LayerÂ 2 VLAN.
